comment: DR Rocha is one of the best professors I have ever had. She was very kind and very knowledgeable about what she was talking about and I loved all of her lectures.  Overall  I would say take her class because she is a great professor and a great person to learn from!!

I loved this class! I was one of the very few who participated and showed up consistently. There is a lot of reading, but we are not tested on it and only briefly talk about it in class. No tests or quizzes, just forums about your opinion/what you've learned. Group projects are fun! The lectures are interesting and informative. Take this class!

I love Dr. Rocha, she is such a sweet lady! Loves the topic of black issues and the struggles we face. The class consists mostly of lectures and class discussions. Attendance isn't mandatory, so a lot of people stopped showing up! Not a lot of work at all so far. We've done three assignments, and it's almost the end of the semester.

Had a lot of issues during the semester and technical difficulties. She would say that she would post something on d2l and never did. Not sure if it was just a bad semester for her, but we literally had 2 assignments the whole time. Lectures still happened, I liked learning about the content and the class discussions were interesting
Professor Rocha is an inspirational lecturer. Her classes are always engaging and she leads productive debates amongst the students. I really enjoyed taking her class!

do not take this woman's class. She literally does not answer emails and will go AWOL for months. The work assignment on D2L were very confusing and hard to understand so the entire coursework was changed. would not recommend.

Very hard to get in contact with and students had to contact deparment chair in order to get any work assigned. Claimed "technical difficulties". As a student, this is not the stress you want. I would not take her class.

Professor Rocha was very friendly. We had weekly readings and every week we had a group present the readings. Our final was a PowerPoint on a topic based on what was discussed in class. There were 3 open note tests.

Taking Dr. Rocha's class was honestly a joy. She had many technical difficulties, but she always kept the class moving. We had an attendance sheet, but I'm not sure if it was graded. Her lectures were interesting. We did about 3 group discussion boards, a couple of quizzes in D2L, and weekly class discussions. She provided all of the texts we read.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Amazing lectures

comment: Sooo so sweet loved her. Shes very caring of her students and her class was by far the most interesting ive ever taken TAKE HER!

I took this class over the summer. She was nice, but she wasn't very responsive with emails. The class is very straight forward and simple and she'll give you an A as long as you try on the work.The quizzes can be a little hard but if you read the articles, you'll be fine.

Professor Rocha is an amazing professor and knows what she is teaching. I learned so much more than just surface level knowledge about African and Black history. We had a few mini quizzes that were open notes, 4 discussion posts, weekly assigned readings, and a final group project. She had great energy during class. Definitely take her if you can!

so Rocha is pretty good. you can tell she's is very passionate about African life. throughout the ENTIRE semester she claimed she had technical difficulties when it came to grading, but zero, when it came to assigning work. she LITERALLY graded everything the LAST WEEK of the semester. the exam is optional if you have an a, which I did. so no exam!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: I love her. Shes a great teacher and is very knowledgeable about the subject. Many opportunities for extra credit. Open book exams and quizzes.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Amazing lectures

comment: By far my favorite professor that I have met. She is brilliant and super kind. Her lectures are interesting and feedback heavy. Be ready to participate!
Professor Rocha was an amazing professor. Although being 100% online, she made herself accessible at all times. I learned great information & ended the class with an A. I look up to her as a mentor.

Rocha was a really understanding prof and her personal experiences within the subjects talked about in class made the conversations even more substantial. Your main assignments are online and she opens the entire class period for discussions, going over the texts, and watching relevant clips to further the understanding. I would 100% recommend her!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Rocah is a really good professor. This semester has been cut short because of COVID-19 but we are still taking classes online. She took away a lot of the assignments so that we would have less stress and that shows how flexible she is and how much she cares. She is funny & has great lectures & I would recommend her. I would take her again
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Dr. Rocha is an amazing Professor. She grades tough, but if you show youre putting in the effort shes willing to work with you. Incredibly interesting lectures and an all around very sweet lady. Would take her again!

She is very sweet, however, this year was her first as a professor. Dr. Rocha is extremely intelligent and the lectures are interesting. There is just a lot of outside work that is very time consuming with very formally worded quiz questions.
